content.en: Automated gel analysis: Scientists have developed various algorithms to automate the analysis of two-dimensional electrophoresis gels, which are commonly used in protein research. These algorithms enable tasks such as spot identification, quantification, interpolation, segmentation, alignment, comparison, and matching of protein spots in the gels. They utilize techniques from image processing, vision, artificial intelligence, and machine learning to improve the speed, accuracy, and reproducibility of the analysis process.
content.da: Automatiseret gelanalyse: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer til at automatisere analysen af todimensionale elektroforesegeler, som almindeligvis anvendes i proteinforskning. Disse algoritmer muliggør opgaver som identifikation, kvantificering, interpolation, segmentering, justering, sammenligning og matchning af proteiner i gelerne. De anvender teknikker fra billedbehandling, vision, kunstig intelligens og maskinlæring for at forbedre hastigheden, nøjagtigheden og reproducerbarheden af analyseprocessen.
